button.name: NCI GDC
button.intro:
The NCI's Genomic Data Commmons (GDC) is a repository of harmonized datasets of large cancer cohorts. Following applications allow to access and visualize GDC datasets via on-the-fly query to the GDC API.

  • BAM slicing
  • Coding mutation lollipop plot (or use gene search box below)
  • Single cell RNA-seq
  • Disco plot
  • Oncomatrix
